response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This product, tailored to your needs and desires, is worth $1,000,000 to you. Considering its significance and the effort put into creating it, I am offering you the chance to own it at a special price of $900,000. I believe this offer reflects the true worth and benefits it will bring to you. Should you choose to accept, I am confident it will exceed your expectations and become a valuable asset in your life. If you need any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to hearing your decision soon.", "product_price": 900000}
